state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, move west. After that, venture south. With that accomplished, try to go south. And then, go east. Okay, and then, make an effort to move south. If you can get around to doing that, attempt to move east. And then, attempt to go to the south. Then, travel west. If you can succeed at that, attempt to head north. Then, move west. Then, head north. Okay, and then, attempt to go east. Then, go to the south. That done, go to the east. With that over with, recover the coin from the floor of the cookhouse. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Chamber =- You are in a chamber. A normal one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Chamber =-0/1
